thread.title: Hear Fifth Harmony's Normani Kordei Soulfully Cover Solange
thread.title_full: Hear Fifth Harmony's Normani Kordei Soulfully Cover Solange

title: Hear Fifth Harmony's Normani Kordei Soulfully Cover Solange

organizations.name: normani kordei soulfully cover solange hear fifth harmony

text:
Hear Fifth Harmony's Normani Kordei Soulfully Cover Solange Singer takes on "Don't Touch My Hair" and "Cranes in the Sky" Fifth Harmony's Normani Kordei has unveiled her mashup of Solange's "Don't Touch My Hair" and "Cranes in the Sky." 
Fifth Harmony's Normani Kordei has unveiled her mashup of two songs from Solange's A Seat at the Table . The singer takes on "Don't Touch My Hair" and "Cranes in the Sky," which USA Today premiered. Related PHOTOS: 50 Best Songs of 2016 Beyoncé owned our world, Drake lit up the dance floor, and Rae Sremmurd got their John Lennon on 
During the almost five-minute track, Kordei soulfully sings over the Invaders' delicate production and finger-snapped rhythms. She effortlessly blends together the songs, which are buoyed by beautifully harmonized background vocals. 
"I was inspired by Solange's album, A Seat at the Table , from the moment I heard it," she told USA Today . "She has clearly taken the time to create a unique body of work and emote through her music from a true place." 
Last month, Camila Cabello announced her exit from Fifth Harmony. The remaining members posted their first photo as a quartet on Thursday. — Fifth Harmony (@FifthHarmony) January 5, 2017 
While Kordei has maintained she will remain in Fifth Harmony, this is her second solo mashup in as many months. She unveiled her rendition of Drake's "Fake Love" and "Sneakin'" in December. 
Kordei also told the newspaper about her "prosperous" year ahead, and said, "not only regarding Fifth Harmony and this new chapter together, but also my own personal endeavors in and outside of music." More News
